text: Is there a filter to normalize words like español to espanol or português to portugues ?
Hi there - does anyone know whether I can change width of drag n drop emails? Or is this all mobile-first hot shit on max 600px? :wink:
is it possible to disable/remove a domain level stylesheet in a coded template?

Yep! You can do this using template annotations.
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tools/local-development-reference#local-template-format#local-template-format>

Hi :wave:
Is there any solution to *create url based on tags*? I'm trying to build carrer page with subpages for particular departments and cities that are available from address line in the browser. The url should look like:
```.../careers/finance/new-york```
and then list all the available positions in New York in the finance department.

Thanks in advance!
im pretty sure you can do this using hubdb and dynamic pages (to some extent)
